00020 #include "LinearMobility.h"
00021 
00022 #include <FWMath.h>
00023 
00024 
00025 Define_Module(LinearMobility);
00026 
00027 void LinearMobility::initialize(int stage)
00028 {
00029     BaseMobility::initialize(stage);
00030 
00031     EV << "initializing LinearMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00032 
00033     if (stage == 0){
00034 
00035         move.speed = par("speed");
00036         acceleration = par("acceleration");
00037         angle = par("angle");
00038         angle = fmod(angle,360);
00039     }
00040     else if(stage == 1){
00041   stepTarget = move.startPos;
00042     }
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 void LinearMobility::fixIfHostGetsOutside()
00047 {
00048     Coord dummy;
00049     handleIfOutside(WRAP, stepTarget, dummy, dummy, angle);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00057 void LinearMobility::makeMove()
00058 {
00059     EV << "start makeMove " << move.info() << endl;
00060 
00061     move.startPos = stepTarget;
00062     move.startTime = simTime();
00063 
00064     stepTarget.setX(move.startPos.getX() + move.speed * cos(PI * angle / 180) * updateInterval.dbl());
00065     stepTarget.setY(move.startPos.getY() + move.speed * sin(PI * angle / 180) * updateInterval.dbl());
00066 
00067     move.setDirection(stepTarget);
00068 
00069     EV << "new stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << endl;
00070 
00071     // accelerate
00072     move.speed += acceleration * updateInterval.dbl();
00073 
00074     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00075 }
